autoLink.description: If you do not meet the conditions for automatic association, you can associate it manually, see the following precautions
autoLink.description_zh: 是否自动关联表单域，对于大部分情况都可以使用自动关联，如果不满足自动关联的条件，可以手动关联，参见下方注意事项

colon.description: Used in conjunction with the label attribute to indicate whether or not to display a colon after label
colon.description_zh: 配合 label 属性使用，表示是否显示 label 后面的冒号

:extra.description: An extra hint, similar to help, can be used when you need both an error message and a hint copy.
:extra.description_zh: 额外的提示信息，和 help 类似，当需要错误信息和提示文案同时出现时，可以使用这个。

hasFeedback.description: It is recommended to use it with the validateStatus property to display the verification status icon, which is recommended to be used only with the Input component
hasFeedback.description_zh: 配合 validateStatus 属性使用，展示校验状态图标，建议只配合 Input 组件使用

help.description: If the prompt message is not set, it will be automatically generated based on the verification rules
help.description_zh: 提示信息，如不设置，则会根据校验规则自动生成

htmlFor.description: Set the child element label 'htmlFor' attribute
htmlFor.description_zh: 设置子元素 label `htmlFor` 属性

label.description: The text of the label label

:labelCol.description: label layout, with the ''' component, set the 'span' 'offset' value, such as '{span: 3, offset: 12}' <Col>or 'sm: {span: 3, offset: 12}'
:labelCol.description_zh: label 标签布局，同 `<Col>` 组件，设置 `span` `offset` 值，如 `{span: 3, offset: 12}` 或 `sm: {span: 3, offset: 12}`

name.description: The form field model field, which is required in the case of using the validate, resetFields methods
name.description_zh: 表单域 model 字段，在使用 validate、resetFields 方法的情况下，该属性是必填的

required.description: If not, it will be automatically generated based on the validation rules
required.description_zh: 是否必填，如不设置，则会根据校验规则自动生成

validateFirst.description: When a rule fails to be verified, whether to stop the verification of the remaining rules.
validateFirst.description_zh: 当某一规则校验不通过时，是否停止剩下的规则的校验。

validateStatus.description: If the verification status is not set, it will be automatically generated according to the verification rules, optional: 'success' 'warning' 'error' 'validating'
validateStatus.description_zh: 校验状态，如不设置，则会根据校验规则自动生成，可选：'success' 'warning' 'error' 'validating'

validateTrigger.description: Set the timing of field validation

:wrapperCol.description: Use this property when you need to style a layout for an input control, and use it in the same way as labelCol
:wrapperCol.description_zh: 需要为输入控件设置布局样式时，使用该属性，用法同 labelCol
